backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user profiles, subscriptions, quotas, posts, listings, and authorization with extensive state maps and plan/entitlement logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new schema by adding new subscription, quota, and interaction maps with defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human-written summaries of numerous frontend components and feature modules.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration for frontend deployment specifying caching and security headers for various file types.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the root React app and Google Analytics script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing global form state, authentication, navigation refs, and feature modals via context.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Sign‑in/sign‑out UI using Internet Identity, showing principal info and handling login errors.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Development‑only banner that detects and displays IC deployment or actor initialization issues.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating the user's subscription plan with different styles for each tier.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Component that animates children into view based on scroll position and motion preferences.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: React Query hooks for fetching authenticated user data including downloads, saved templates, and creator earnings.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Generates and downloads birthday card images using canvas, supporting templates and premium designer themes.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Utility that loads a background image for canvas rendering with cross‑origin support.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Creates a printable PDF‑style page for a generated birthday pack using a new browser window.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Canvas text‑wrapping helper that splits text into lines based on a max width.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Renders a card showing a community post with metadata, creator info, and follow/view actions.
Displays a dialog with full post details, creator info, timestamps, and follow controls.
Provides a form dialog for authenticated users to create community posts with title, type, and description.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: React Query hooks for fetching all community posts or a single post via the backend actor.
Mutation hook to create posts through the backend actor and refresh the posts list with toast notifications.
Manages following creators using local storage and backend subscriptions with related mutation and state hooks.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Contains predefined sample birthday wishes with metadata like name, relationship, and tone.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Defines constant lists for relationships, tones, languages, and personalities used in the generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a single string containing all generated message sections.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates a complete BirthdayPack from form data using language-specific phrase templates and helpers.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides phrase packs for English, Hinglish, and Hindi and a helper to select phrases based on language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Randomizes form fields for the birthday generator, including name, tone, language, and relationship.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines types for generator form data, relationships, tones, languages, personalities, and birthday template IDs.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: Dialog component for creating marketplace listings with validation and entitlement checks.
Displays a marketplace listing card with metadata, pricing, and a request-to-buy button.
Dialog for buyers to contact sellers, copy a prefilled message, or record interest.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation hook to create marketplace listings and handle success/error states.
Mutation hook to record buyer interest in a listing via actor API.
Query hook to fetch interaction counts for a specific marketplace listing.
Hooks to fetch all marketplace listings or a single listing by ID.
Provides a hook for initiating plan upgrades with placeholder Razorpay integration and status handling.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of placeholder cards showing upcoming premium features with icons and descriptions.
Provides UI controls for adjusting card settings such as background, typography, colors, alignment, and photo upload.
Handles exporting cards as images, sharing to social platforms, and copying text using designer state and export utilities.
Main module controlling the designer flow, theme selection, customization interface, preview, and export actions.
Renders a live card preview using the selected theme and designer state, including animations, emojis, and photo placement.
Defines the list of premium themes and a helper to retrieve a theme by ID.
Defines TypeScript types for premium themes, designer state, and customization options.
Implements a React hook managing all card designer state fields and update functions.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Manages daily quota records in localStorage, resetting counts per day and providing helpers to increment and compute remaining quota.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: React hook that determines remaining message quota using backend for authenticated users and localStorage for anonymous users, and records message usage.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata, entitlements, and plan helper functions for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: UI wrapper that blurs locked content and shows a button to open the pricing modal for premium features.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Displays a modal comparing subscription plans and allows users to upgrade via Razorpay.
Renders a feature comparison table across Free, Pro, and Creator plans.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: React hook that fetches subscription status to determine the user's effective plan and entitlements.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: React hook that retrieves the caller's subscription status from the backend.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: Renders the surprise reveal experience with confetti, message timing, and optional background music.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: Hooks for creating surprise links and fetching their payloads using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns CSS class strings for visual card templates based on a template ID.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Maps template background keys to static asset paths and provides a lookup function.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines the Template interface and exports a list of predefined visual templates with styling and asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and context access for authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Provides a hook that tracks whether a referenced element is visible using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages a user's selected subscription plan with persistence in localStorage scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion based on a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to verify the authenticated principal and returns it or null.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, components, and utility classes including neon effects and animations.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides a function to copy text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Contains helpers for formatting timestamps into relative or short date strings.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Exports a helper to shorten principal strings for display.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds a sharable WhatsApp link with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint setting up React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community section with tabs, post listing, filters, and dialogs for viewing and creating posts using user authentication and creator-follow state.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Displays a personalized dashboard showing subscription status, usage data, downloads, and earnings, with gated access for authenticated users.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Shows sample birthday wishes with a tone filter and animated reveal, rendering each wish in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Provides an FAQ section using an accordion to display common questions and answers about the service.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, navigation links, legal links, and attribution including the current year.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the birthday wish generator form with validation, quota checks, randomization, and actions to generate, copy, and share outputs.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing hero with branding, social proof, and entry buttons, adapting actions based on authentication state.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Displays Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy using styled card components.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Shows marketplace listings with search, filtering, and a create-listing dialog, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Presents generated wish outputs and supports copying, sharing, exporting, and creating surprise links with plan checks.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Lists subscription plans with features and pricing, highlighting the Pro plan and enabling plan selection.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Lets users browse and select card templates and previews the final card when outputs are available.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom colors, radii, shadows, fonts, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, environment variable prefixes, path aliases, dev server proxy, and optimized build settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, goals, architectural notes, issues, and implemented features for the WishMint AI platform.
